rules_text:
Covert [i](This creature can't be blocked by creatures that weren't under their controllers control since the start of their last turn.)[/i]
When this creature enters, seize The Core.
{2}{U}, Pay {E}{E}{E}, Sacrifice this creature: Draw two cards.
notes:
!addtoken Energy Reserve; The Core;
!token Energy Reserve VRN; The Core VRN;
